Title: Notification obligation regarding rectification or erasure of personal data or restriction of processing

Conditions: Rectification of personal data in accordance with Article 16
Erasure of personal data in accordance with Article 17(1)
Restriction of processing in accordance with Article 18

Recipients.Definition: Each recipient to whom the personal data have been disclosed
Conditions: Notification does not involve disproportionate effort

Data_Subject_Information.Requests: The controller shall inform the data subject about those recipients if the data subject requests it.
